title: Spare Parts
description: Beep! My brothers have all been infected by Maelstrom.
objective: <font color='#FF7F00'>Collect 3 spare parts</font> by smashing <font color='#FF7F00'>Stromling Mechs</font> in Avant Gardens. Then smash and <font color='#FF7F00'>rebuild the Defense Robot</font> by the Paradox Lab.
